data.name: Revival of Love
data.detailed_description:
Revival of Love

is a nonviolent, musical, low poly, open world, and vegan action-adventure game about the young saxophonist, Adolphine, who sets off on a journey to heal a peculiar island that has sunken in darkness.

She will face demons who once were wise and happy people but are now possessed by the dark forces. She will battle them using not weapons but her music and love to finally heal their souls, to relieve them of their terrible torment.
Adolphine has enough courage to face the corrupted people of Tenebra Island and she fears nothing because she knows how powerful music and love can be and that’s exactly what Tenebra Island needs in this dark and cold chapter of the mysterious island's history.

Features


  • Cleanse clouds of dark mist, in which demons reside, until none are left and the whole island is healed. Achieve this by playing sax for the demons and also using
    superpowers!:
    • Healing Spree. Pop lots of notes and reach more than one demon at the same time.
    • Invulnerable. Avoid getting any damage while the concentrated power of love shields you.
    • Unicorn ride. Summon a unicorn from higher realms to aid you in your battles or simply ask for a ride to get somewhere quicker. Unicorns can't wait to aid Adolphine in her quest.

  • Beautiful and cool sax melodies are unlocked throughout the game together with superpowers and outfits. Each melody pops different shiny notes! Choose a melody that's easy and mellow or maybe some bizarre avant-garde? Ado loves to play both!

  • Defeat the wicked boss, who's behind the corruption of the island. Experience the epic final battle and restore prosperity to the Dark Island once and for all.

  • Explore the unique style island, filled with funny and cute interactable fauna and flora, and find all hidden collectibles.

  • Set free caged villagers, who managed to avoid possession of the dark forces. Jam with them at the base camp when you feel you need to catch your breath.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-530
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 260 / ATI Radeon HD 4870
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Newer
  • Processor: i5-6400
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 1060 6GB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
